title: Supporting learning through curiosity and wonder preservation
description: Supporting learning through curiosity and wonder preservation
content:
Scenario: Supporting learning through curiosity and wonder preservation
    Given Tommy is 5 and full of questions and wonder
    And Margaret nurtures his curiosity through patient engagement
    When the educational_elohim tracks wonder cultivation
    Then it should recognize wonder preservation as sophisticated teaching
    And it should value Margaret's role in maintaining curiosity
    And it should track learning through exploration and questioning
    And curiosity cultivation should accumulate care tokens
    And Margaret's patient teaching should be recognized as developmental expertise
    And wonder-based learning should be valued as essential education
